item.title: [FLINK-26977] JobMasterStopWithSavepointITCase.throwingExceptionOnCallbackWithRestartsShouldSimplyRestartInTerminate failed on azure

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The problem seems to related to adaptive scheduler, perhaps cc dmvk~
I'll take over as I missed this test when working on FLINK-26783 and FLINK-26923.
